verses.name: 1 Peter 5:1
verses.text: The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:2
verses.text: Feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:3
verses.text: Neither as being lords over God’s heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:4
verses.text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:5
verses.text: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:6
verses.text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:7
verses.text: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:8
verses.text: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:9
verses.text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:10
verses.text: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:11
verses.text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:12
verses.text: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:13
verses.text: The church that is at Babylon, elected together with you, saluteth you; and so doth Marcus my son.

verses.name: 1 Peter 5:14
verses.text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.
